query:
ALTER TABLE employees 
ADD COLUMN gamificationPoints INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN gamificationLevel VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Bronze' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN lastPointsUpdate TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
